title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published to npm as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, published to PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (PyPI: langchain-ollama) exposing Ollama models as LangChain LLMs & embedders.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (Docker-ready) with chat history, model management, and multi-user support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI for chatting, pulling, and managing Ollama models with syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot’s slot for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve example showing how to scale and serve Ollama models across a cluster.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration (PyPI: ollama-haystack) for using Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama published to Maven Central; supports sync, async, and reactive streaming.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Collection of ready-made docker-compose stacks bundling Ollama with WebUI, Postgres, and optional GPU flags.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and autoscaling options.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for fine-tuning, RAG, function-calling, and edge-deployment patterns with Ollama.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that lets a server chat with any local Ollama model using slash commands.

title: ollama-macos-swiftui
summary: Native macOS SwiftUI app that wraps the Ollama REST API for chat and model downloads.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package derivation for Ollama enabling reproducible installs on Linux/macOS with CUDA or ROCm.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate (ollama-rs) providing typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a “Chat with Ollama” pane for local AI-assisted note-taking.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Minimal Streamlit chat UI that connects to Ollama via the Python client for quick prototyping.
